name: 方釩溱
objective:
課程的目標期待透過理論與案例研究幫助學生理解「金融科技」，包括改變付款方式的破壞力、分析不斷變化的監管環境，並對人工智慧、區塊鏈、上雲、行動銀行、開放銀行、機器人顧問、眾籌、P2P 借貸等金融科技議題有著更深入的了解；此外，也介紹資訊安全與目前監管機構在金融科技的角色。

The objective of the course is to help students understand "Financial Technology" through theory and case studies, including the disruptive impact of changing payment methods, analyzing the constantly evolving regulatory environment, and gaining a deeper understanding of financial technology topics such as artificial intelligence, blockchain, cloud computing, mobile banking, open banking, robo-advisors, crowdfunding, peer-to-peer lending, etc. Additionally, it introduces information security and the role of current regulatory agencies in financial technology.
